text: Yasa karanale hamile isra'ilaka manisaharuka lagi yo adesa garyaum ki yadi kunai manisale kunai manisako hatya gardacha kasaiko hatya gareko va desama upadrava phaila'une bahekako avasthama, bhane tyasale an'ya samasta manisaharuko hatya gare saraha hunecha, ra yadi kasaile e'utako jivana bacayo bhane sampurna manisaharuko jivana baca'e saraha huncha. Ra tiniharukaham hamra dherai paigambaraharu spasta tarkaharuli'era pugisakeka chan. Ani yasapachi pani tiniharumadhye dheraile mulukama balajaphti ra jyadati garne gardachan
